tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    location_id INT,
    rating FLOAT,
    review_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE HotelReviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hotel_id INT,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    review_text TEXT,
    rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE AttractionsReviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    attraction_id INT,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    review_text TEXT,
    rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE customer_reviews_hotels(
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hotel_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating FLOAT,
    customer_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE customer_reviews_attractions(
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    attraction_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating FLOAT,
    customer_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE hotel_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hotel_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    rating FLOAT,
    review_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE attraction_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    attraction_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    rating FLOAT,
    review_text TEXT
);
